cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13)
set(CMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE on)

add_compile_options(-std=c++20 -fexceptions)

add_library(fast_float INTERFACE)

target_include_directories(fast_float INTERFACE include)
